data.title: Pretzel Crust = NO!
data.text:
I have a login and password for my "home" pizza hut in another state.  Used it while at a hotel in Montebello.  I ordered a large pizza with the pretzel crust.  

The pretzel crust is terrible!  Way to salty.  I tweeted about it and got a response from Corporate Pizza Hut.  I was impressed they really cared.

But back to the Montebello Pizza Hut . . .  delivery of pizza was within 38 minutes of my placing the order.  Absolutely no problem at all having it delivered to my hotel at the Hilton Garden Inn at Montebello.  Staff was efficient and even respectful of parking in the appropriate area.

I would order from this Pizza Hut again, as food is reliable.  However, say no to the Pretzel Crust.

data.title: Deliciosas pizzas
data.text: Pedimos para entregar no hotel em que estávamos, chegou dentro do horário informado, estava quentinha e deliciosa. As pizzas são generosas, não como nossas pizzas brasileiras, mas mesmo assim ótimas.
